Class BDDBitVector

java.lang.Object
org.ants.javandd.BDDBitVector
public abstract class BDDBitVector extends Object
Bit experiment.vector implementation for BDDs.
Version:
$Id: BDDBitVector.java,v 1.2 2004/10/18 09:35:20 joewhaley Exp $
Author:
John Whaley
